cause: 28:2254 Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus (State)

recap_documents.description: ORDER that Petitioner's Amended Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus  106  is DENIED. A Certificate of Appealability is issued as to the following issues: (1) Whether this Court erred in denying Bejaranos request for an evidentiary hearing. (2) W hether Claim Two(A), alleging petitioners rights under the Sixth Amendment were violated as a result of trial counsels performance in the penalty phase of his trial, fails on the merits. Petitioners Motion for Reconsideration  158  is DENIED. Case terminated.  Signed by Judge Philip M. Pro on 9/1/10.  (Copies have been distributed pursuant to the NEF - ECS)
